basics.name: Erick Orozco-Ciprian
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Contribute to the updating and maintaining of the UH Groupings website and project.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee collective UH Groupings
Organize and distribute security permissions and files across UH with ease

volunteer.summary: Help lead/build curriculum for various NHSEMP projects many of which attribute to the learning and betterment of Native Hawaiian youth
highlights: Computer Science Kumu/Mentor for the NHS Summer Series Program
Kumu for CSP4U which is an accelerated learnign enviroment geared toward those with interest in computer science.
Kumu for Stem Day events where we help youth and their famalies build mini engineering kits

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Students must have a 3.5 GPA, 1200 SAT or 23 ACT upon the time of application to UH Manoa
